title: I have a Pixel 3 Android and I'm unable to connect to a Marriott's Wi-Fi I get a DNS failure.
content: My Pixel 3 gets a DNS server error when trying to attempt to connect to the Marriott's Wi-Fi there should be a web page come up where I select join but that page does not come up and that's when I get the DNS server error our other phone a Pixel 4 has no problems connecting
